c8e783fe-6a89-4098-adf8-ccd6d530e44f.description: The earner of this badge has completed extensive training, demonstrating a commitment to delivering impeccable service in collaboration with other members of the career mobility team. Each member learns the high-touch Randstad RiseSmart approach and proprietary technology—along with the applicable best practices in coaching, professional branding, or job search methodology—to coordinate efforts in providing exceptional service to clients.
c8e783fe-6a89-4098-adf8-ccd6d530e44f.name: randstad risesmart career mobility team

badge_template_activities.title: All career mobility team members who have completed RiseSmart's comprehensive onboarding training course receive a Career Mobility Team badge to signify their demonstration and commitment to delivering impeccable services.

d71cacb5-ff59-4b83-9dc8-7855b02421cc.description: The earner demonstrates understanding and application of effective talent mobility coaching. Assessed on industry coaching competencies, combined with requisite years of coaching experience, Randstad RiseSmart certified career coaches demonstrate core coaching competencies and skills necessary in the client-coaching relationship. The certification exam is based on coursework that provides advanced coach training directly related to and expanding upon the ICF Core Competencies.
d71cacb5-ff59-4b83-9dc8-7855b02421cc.name: randstad risesmart career coach authority

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Randstad RiseSmart Career Coach Core Knowledge Assessment
Minimum of 100 hours of career coaching
60 hours of professional development in career coaching and/or Randstad RiseSmart methodology and technology

381501b1-21dd-4bff-8e28-2fbfb5a6afce.description: A Professional Branding Authority is an expert resume/CV writer skilled in crafting compelling, well-designed and effective documents and online profiles. Individuals earning this badge can take raw data and transform it into a professional story and brand for today’s job seekers. Writers earning this badge complete an intensive mentoring program aligned with current best practices in resume writing, understanding the ideal strategy and format suited to each unique individual.
381501b1-21dd-4bff-8e28-2fbfb5a6afce.name: randstad risesmart professional branding authority

alignments.name: Professional Association of Resume Writers & Career Coaches (PARW/CC)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a comprehensive training program and one month mentorship under a Randstad RiseSmart Professional Branding Master
All branding documents must pass an extensive quality assurance assessment
Minimum of 20 hours of initial training and mentoring

af218528-7848-4ecb-bda9-2b9763da9ea0.description: A Job Concierge Authority has successfully completed extensive training on evaluating client requirements, skills, and experience and processing applicable job leads for global clients. Individuals earning this badge are able to evaluate resumes, LinkedIn profiles, and other records to identify highly targeted search parameters to use to identify appropriate job openings. JCRs complete an intensive mentoring program aligned with best practices, strategies, and efficient processing methods.
af218528-7848-4ecb-bda9-2b9763da9ea0.name: randstad risesmart job concierge authority

badge_template_activities.title: Complete mentoring program that ranges from 4 to 14 weeks (160 hours to 560 hours) depending on prior experience
Assessment of all Job lead processing to ensure all leads consistently meet quality assurance parameters and processing time

35c22634-eadc-4bba-bf11-0bd7b098c9aa.description: The earner of this badge has knowledge and skills to support clients in developing a strategy to address skill or education gaps that impact career goals. The Certified Learning Advisor (CLA) guides clients to develop actionable learning plans that close those gaps, allowing them to work efficiently toward their goals. The CLA has completed specialized training and 5+ years’ experience in career coaching and academic advising.
35c22634-eadc-4bba-bf11-0bd7b098c9aa.name: randstad risesmart certified learning advisor

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Certified Learning Advisor course and certification process
Complete 60 hours of additional professional development courses or certification related to career coaching and/or academic advising
Have a minimum of 5 years coaching experience in both job search and career development and/or leadership coaching
Have a minimum of 5 years of professional academic experience (e.g., professor, adjunct faculty, academic or career advisor)

5b0e720b-80a4-49e1-9e59-9f63cbd65cd6.description: A Professional Branding Expert is a well-established resume/CV writer with experience supporting a wide range of job seekers. An individual earning this badge offers specialized knowledge in working with professionals at all career levels, including executives and those in niche industries. The earner of this badge is skilled in developing targeted job search materials such as resumes, social networking site profiles and professional biographies.
5b0e720b-80a4-49e1-9e59-9f63cbd65cd6.name: randstad risesmart professional branding expert

alignments.name: Professional Association of Resume Writers & Career Coaches (PARW/CC)

badge_template_activities.title: randstad risesmart professional branding authority
Training and mentorship under a Randstad RiseSmart Professional Branding Master for executives and special projects
Ongoing systematic review of resumes/CVs in QA program with a 12-point quality assurance assessment
25 hours of training and mentoring
250 completed resume projects

cbbb1b34-b05c-449f-b3c6-a823ad89082b.description: The Coaching for Finance & Banking industry specialist badge is issued to coaches who have demonstrated in-depth industry knowledge and have proven their ability to support a wide range of individuals within the industry. Coaches must submit examples of their industry understanding and pass an associated internal assessment.
cbbb1b34-b05c-449f-b3c6-a823ad89082b.name: randstad risesmart coaching for finance & banking industry specialist

badge_template_activities.title: randstad risesmart career coach authority
At least 6 months working at Randstad RiseSmart

Provide extensive proof of specialization including but not limited to the following: Conducted a webinar on the specialty, Spoke at industry related conference, Published articles focused on industry knowledge, Worked 3+ years within the industry
Completion of internal assessment for this specialty

0b1e6900-7d65-4ac1-8329-c06bbb5e5a0d.description: Earners of the Secure Coding Certification understand the best practices of developing computer software in a way that guards against security vulnerabilities and mitigates major risks. The badge recognizes that earners have the knowledge to apply general secure coding guidelines and incorporate security practices into each phase of the software development lifecycle. The earner has a foundational understanding of secure software development and methodologies.
0b1e6900-7d65-4ac1-8329-c06bbb5e5a0d.name: randstad risesmart secure coding certification

43806e60-7eb9-44d2-9c4c-5df603335d69.description: A Professional Branding Master is a highly-trained expert in resume writing strategy and best practices who teaches, mentors and/or supervises others in the resume writing profession. Earners may participate in pilot programs as a senior resume writing expert and advisor. Writers at the Master level possess the deep knowledge and years of experience to determine the best resume writing approach for candidates across a variety of industries and professional levels.
43806e60-7eb9-44d2-9c4c-5df603335d69.name: randstad risesmart professional branding master

47358c90-2f4a-4e1f-94ca-fa88b7661068.description: A Job Concierge Expert is a well-established job search specialist for professionals at all career levels. In addition, individuals earning this badge have the additional experience and expertise to support premier clients with niche skills, high-visibility pilot programs, and executive-level clients. The earner of this badge is able to conduct global research requests and identifies appropriate events and job fairs based on a client’s needs.
47358c90-2f4a-4e1f-94ca-fa88b7661068.name: randstad risesmart job concierge expert

badge_template_activities.title: randstad risesmart job concierge authority

Experience with global research projects for events, job fairs, executive requests, and special projects; supports premier clients with niche skills, high-visibility pilot programs, and executive-level clients
1 year full-time (or 2000 hours) in job search facilitation

a6146679-7b05-42ee-b642-40b6adcc1b10.description: A Branding Foundations Certified Professional has successfully completed the coursework and exam requirements to be recognized as an expert in resume writing fundamentals. This credential exemplifies a solid understanding of professional resume writing terminology, recommended formats for all audiences, and strategic approaches to resume writing. Individuals with this badge also understand how Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) work and how to create ATS-friendly documents for today's job seekers.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of RiseSmart Comprehensive Resume Writing Branding Foundations course and 2 part assessment.
